revised_title: Influenza Vaccination: Advances in Vaccine Development and Strategies
tldr: This article discusses the advancements in influenza vaccine development, focusing on the use of purified haemagglutinin and neuraminidase subunits in vaccines. The author also highlights the importance of evaluating the effectiveness and safety of different types of vaccines, including live and inactivated vaccines, and the need for continued surveillance and monitoring of vaccine use.
